duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide financial planning and advisory services to clients, addressing their investment, wealth management, and tax planning needs.
Develop and implement personalized college planning and tax-free retirement options for clients, ensuring their financial well-being.
Offer asset protection and long-term care solutions, tailoring strategies to meet the unique needs of each client.
Conduct comprehensive estate planning, guiding clients through the process of protecting and distributing their assets efficiently.
Deliver exceptional customer service, building strong relationships with clients and addressing their financial concerns with empathy and expertise.
Utilize sales and marketing techniques to expand client base and promote financial services, demonstrating the value of our offerings.
Manage client portfolios and financial accounts, ensuring effective asset management and financial growth.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Finance, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
Certification in Financial Planning or Wealth Management (CFA, CFP, or equivalent)
